thread.title: Federal Sony data breach lawsuit settled, lawyer says
thread.title_full: Federal Sony data breach lawsuit settled, lawyer says

title: Federal Sony data breach lawsuit settled, lawyer says
text: Federal Sony data breach lawsuit settled, lawyer says Wednesday, 2 September 2015 (7 minutes ago) Lawyers for former Sony Pictures Entertainment employees whose data was breached last year say they have tentatively reached a settlement with the company. Ashley Madison Hack: The Lawyers Are on the Way 01:19 It must have been a panic attack weekend for Ashley Madison website customers wondering whether they were soon to be outed in the latest highly publicized breach of cybersecurity.State and federal judges and prosecutors, federal employees, military personnel, college professors, journalists,...
